meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family, typically having blue or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The nigella in the garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: I planted some nigella seeds in my backyard to add color.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the nigella flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of nigella in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the nigella danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The dried seeds of the nigella plant, used as a spice in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added a pinch of nigella to the curry for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of nigella seeds filled the kitchen as I cooked.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the nigella seeds all over the counter.
meanings.sent4: The nigella seeds sprinkled on top gave the dish a unique twist.
meanings.sent5: The rich scent of nigella seeds reminded her of her grandmother's cooking.
